2022320.name: Dancin Divas Demo
2022320.description:
A robbery has taken place! Four Diva's from around the world are showcasing their treasures at the local lounge but things have gone south. It's time to fight back! Classic arcade side scrolling beat em up with some sexy character design and radical gameplay!

Viva - The one in blue with the most balanced skills and the power of lightning.


Hina - In the red, she goes for long range attacks and isn't afraid to play with fire.


Bahati - The one in yellow can use their large size and perform quite the wrestling suplexes to break the earth!


Sofia - The shortest, this green one is quick with their moves and agility and fly like the wind.


- Play over 16 show stopping levels across the globe!
- Dozens of combos and hundreds of and animated frame animations!
- In game shop with unlocks, cheats, weapons and more!
- Voices from the talented MizzPeachy, Mimi Hung, Flirty Fawn, Cinder & SedThePanda!
- Classic Midi bop soundtrack by lovely_pantaloons
2022320.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
